Maaku: "Hollee lam ɗin ɗi waɗtidu-ɗon e Makko kafidiiɗi. Wanaa non woniri! Si ko woni, ko Kanko woni Alla Fooluɗo, Ñeeñuɗo On
Men nuliraali ma, si wanaa e yimɓe ɓen fow: wewlinoowo e jertinoowo. Kono ko ɓuri ɗuuɗude e yimɓe ɓen, ɓe anndaa
Hiɓe wi'a: "Ko honnde tuma woni ndee Fodoore, si on laatike goonguɓe
Maaku: "Hino woodani on fodoore, nde o nennitantaake e mayre fotde saa'i, on ardintinantaake nde kadi

Yedduɓe ɓen wi'i: "Men gomɗintaa ndee Alqur'aanaare muk, wanaa nden adiinde nde". Sinno a tinayno tuma nde tooñuɓe ɓen darnetee ka Joomi maɓɓe, hara yoga maɓɓe no rutta yoga konngol, lo'inanooɓe ɓen wi'ana townitinooɓe ɓen: "Si wanaano onon nun, men wonayno gomɗimɓe
Townitinooɓe ɓen wi'ani lo'inanooɓe ɓen: "E ko menen falinoo on e peewal ɓaawo ngal arde e mon? Si ko woni, on woniino bomɓe

Lo'inanooɓe ɓen kadi wi'ani townitinooɓe ɓen: "Si ko woni, ko pewje (mon) jemma e ñalorma, tuma yamiraynoɗon men yo men yeddu Alla, men waɗana Mo fotondirɗi". Ɓe suuɗi ninse ɗen, nde ɓe yi'unoo lepte ɗen. Men waɗi kolombooje e daaɗe ɓen yedduɓe. Hara ɓe yoɓitete si wanaa ko ɓe huuwaynoo kon
Men nulaali jertinoowo e yimɓe saare, si wanaa neeminaaɓe mayre ɓen wi'ay: "Menen ko men yedduɓe ko nulidaɗon kon
Ɓe wi'i kadi: "Ko menen ɓuri ɗuuɗude jawle e ɓiɓɓe, men wonaali kadi lepteteeɓe
Maaku: "Pellet, Joomi am hino weertana arsike on, mo O muuyi, O ɓillini (mo O muuyi). Kono ɓurɓe ɗuuɗude e yimɓe ɓen, ɓe anndaa

Wanaa jawle mon, wanaa jiidi mon woni ko ɓaɗtinirta on ka Amen ɓadal. Si wanaa ɓen gomɗimɓe ɓe golli golle moƴƴe; ɓen ɗon, hino woodani ɓe njoɓdi sowaande, sabu ko ɓe golli kon, kamɓe ka soorooji, ko ɓe hooliiɓe
Ɓen yaccotooɓe e ronkingol (yimɓe ɓen) e Aayeeje Amen ɗen, ɓen ɗon, ka ka nder lepte woni ko ɓe tawnoytee
Maaku: "Pellet, Joomi am hino weertana arsike on, mo O muuyani e jeyaaɓe Makko ɓen, O ɓillini mo (O muuyi e maɓɓe). Kala non ko wintiɗon e huunde, Kanko O lontinay nde. Ko Kanko woni Moƴƴo Arsikoowo
Ñalnde O mooɓtindiroyta ɓe dendaangal, refti O daalana Malaa'ikaaɓe ɓen: "E ko ɓee ɗoo (yimɓe) rewaynoo on
Ɓe wi'a: "Senayee woodanii Ma! Ko An woni giɗo amen gaanin maɓɓe. Toode ko jinnaaji ɗin ɓe rewaynoo, ko ɓuri ɗuuɗude e maɓɓe, ko ɗin (jinnaaji) gomɗini
Hannde non, yoga mon waawanaa yoga nafa wanaa lorra. Men wi'anoya ɓen tooñuɓe: "Meeɗee lepte Yiite nge fennaynoɗon fii mun

Si Aayeeje Amen ɓannguɗe ɗen janngaamma e maɓɓe, ɓe wi'a: "Oo wonaali, si wanaa gorko faalaaɗo falagol on e ko baabiraaɓe mon rewayno rewaynoo". Ɓe wi'i: "Ndee (Alqur’aanaare) wonaali, si wanaa fenaande fefindaande". Yedduɓe ɓen wi'ani goonga kan nde ka arunoo e maɓɓe: "Ndee wonaali, si wanaa mbilewu ɓanngu ngu
Men addanaali ɓee, defte ɗe ɓe janngata. Men meeɗaali nulude e maɓɓe, jertinoowo ado maa
Adinooɓe ɓe ɓen [kadi] fenniino (nulaaɓe mun). [Yimɓe maa ɓen] yottaaki sappaɓal ko Men okkunoo ɓen kon. Ɓen fenni Nulaaɓe Amen ɓen, taskii no lepte Am ɗen wa'unoo

Maaku: "Anndee ko mi waajorta on, ko (huunde) wootere: "Ko nde daroranton Alla ɗiɗo ɗiɗo e gooto gooto, refti miijitoɗon. (Anndon) wondiiɗo mon on aldaa e jinna: O wonaali, si wanaa jertinoowo on, e ko woni yeeso (mon), e lepte saɗtuɗe
Maaku: "Mi lamndaaki on njoɓdi, ɗum ko fii mon. Njoɓdi am ndin wonaali, si wanaa ka Alla. Kanko Ko O Seediiɗo e kala huunde
Maaku: "Pellet, Joomi am ko werlortooɗo [meere nden, hujjaaji] goonga kan, timminɗo anndugol wirniiɗi
Maaku: "Goonga kan arii [Iislaamu on], meere [keeferaaku] ngun alaa ka feeña, kadi, nde ruttotaako
Maaku: "Si mi majjii, haray ko hoore-am mi majjani; si mi feewii kadi, ko sabu ko sabu ko Joomi am wahayini e am kon, tawde pellet, ko O Nanoowo, Ɓadiiɗo
Sinno a tinayno, tuma nde ɓe ɗenyii, - laaworde alanaa (ɓe), - ɓe nanngiree e nokkuure ɓadiinde
Ɓe wi'a: "Men gomɗinii [Darngal] ngal", e ko honno gomɗinal woonirani ɓe e nokku woɗɗuɗo
Hara non ɓe yeddiino nde ko adii, hiɓe werlora ko wirnii e nokku woɗɗuɗo
Heedee hakkunde e ko ɓe tuuyetee, wano golliranoo e nanndo maɓɓe ko adii, tawde ɓe woniino e sikke cikkiniiɗa

Yettoore woodanii Alla, Taguɗo kammuuli ɗin e leydi ndin, Waɗuɗo Malaa'ika'en nulaaɓe, marɓe gabitanji(bibje) ɗi ɗiɗi, ɗi tati e nayi. Himo ɓeyda ko O muuyi e tagu Makko ngun, tawde pellet, Alla ko hattanɗo kala huunde
Kala yurmeende nde Alla udditani yimɓe ɓen, jogitotooɗo nde alaa; kala kadi ko O jogitii, accitoowo ɗum alaa ɓaawo (jogitagol) Makko. Ko Kanko woni Fooluɗo, Ñeeñuɗo
Ko onon yo yimɓe! jantee neema Alla on e mon. Hara tagoowo ko woori Alla no woodi, mo no arsikira on ka kammu e ka leydi? Reweteeɗo alaa si wanaa Kanko! E ko honno yiilirteɗon [e kaa goonga]
Si ɓe fennii ma, pellet Nulaaɓe (goo) fennanooma ado maa. Ko faade e Alla, woni ruttorde fiyakuuji ɗin
Ko onon yo yimɓe! Anndee pellet fodoore Alla nden ko goonga. Wata nguurndam aduna hodu on, wata (seytaane) hodoowo on hodu on e fii Alla
Pellet, seytaane ko gaño wonani on. Haray jogitoree mo gaño. Anndee ko o noddirta fedde makko nden, ko no ɓe jeydiree e yimɓe dulɓoowe ngen
Hino woodani yedduɓe ɓen, lepte saɗtuɗe. Ɓeya gomɗimɓe ɓe golli golle moƴƴe, hino woodani ɓe haforaneede e njoɓdi mawndi

E ko on cuɗinanaaɗo golle mun bonɗe, hara himo yi'a ɗe moƴƴuɗe? - Tawde pellet, Alla no majjina on Mo O muuyi, O fewna Mo O muuyi. Wata a tampinir hoore-maa, sunagol fii maɓɓe. Pellet, Alla ko Annduɗo ko ɓe woni huuwude
Ko Alla woni wurtuɗo keneeli ɗin, ɗi sogga duule, Men yarnira ɗum leydi yoorundi; Men wuurnitira ɗum leydi ndin, ɓaawo ndi yoorude. Ko wano non ummital ngal

Kala tawɗo ko teddungal faalaa (yo o ɗaɓɓir Alla), tawde ko Alla jeyi teddungal ngal fow: ko ka Makko woni ko konngol laaɓungol ƴawata, golle moƴƴe ɗen ɓamta ngol. Ɓen fewjooɓe boneeji, hino woodani ɓe lepte saɗtuɗe. Pewje ɓen ɗen, ko bonay ɗe

Ko Alla tagiri on e mbulbuldi, refti e toɓɓere (maniiyu), refti O waɗi on nooneeji. Deyel saawataa, ngel lelnataa kadi, si wanaa e anndal Makko. Wuurnaaɗo wuurnetaake, ɗuytetaake kadi e nguurndam makko, si wanaa no e deftere. Pellet, ɗum ko newanii ɗum Alla

Maaje ɗen ɗiɗi fotataa: [Ndiyam] goo ɗoo ɗam, ko welɗam, laaɓungo, newiingo njaram mun, ngoo ɗaa, ko lanɗam haaɗuɗam. Hiɗon ñaama e kala majjam, teewu keccu, hiɗon yaltina kadi hen, cuɗaari ndi ɓoornotoɗon. Hiɗa yi'a laaɗe ɗen no awja e maggo, fii yo on ɗaɓɓiron e ɓural Makko. Belajoo on yettay [Mo]

Himo naada jemma on e der ñalorma on, O naada ñalorma on e nder jemma on. O elti kadi naange ngen e lewru ndun. Kala mun no doga haa e lajal innaangal. Ko On mooɗon woni Alla, Joomi mon: Ko Kanko Laamu woodani. Ɗiya ɗi noddoton gaanin Makko, ɗi jeytaa yeru gorol tamara
Si on noddu ɗi, ɗi nanataa noddaandu mon; hay si ɗi nanoy, ɗi jaabitotaako on. Ñalnde Darngal, ɗi yeddoyay sirku mon on. Alaa habroowo ma, wano Humpitiiɗo On
Ko onon yo yimɓe, ko onon woni hatonjimɓe e Alla ɓen, Alla kan, ko Kanko woni Galo Yettiniiɗo On
Si O yiɗii, O naɓa on, O adda tagu hesu
Ɗum wonaali sattuɗum ka Alla

Wonki ronndotaako doŋgal wonkii goo. Hay si teddiraaki [junuubi] kin noddii e ronndaneede, ki ronndantaake hay huunde, hay si ko ɓadondiraaɗo Anndu ko jertintaa [nana waaju], ko ɓen hulirooɓe Joomi mun ka wirnii, ɓe ñiiɓi e Julde. Kala on laɓɓiniiɗo, haray ko hoore makko o woni laɓɓinanaade. Ko ka Alla woni ruttorde nden
Bunɗo e yi'oowo fotataa
wanaa niɓe ɗen e ndaygu ngun
wanaa ɗowdi ndin e henndu wulndu ndun
Wanaa kadi wuurɓe ɓen fotata e maayɓe ɓen. Pellet, Alla no nanina on Mo O muuyani. Wanaa an [Nulaaɗo], woni naninoowo, wonɓe ka genaale ɓen
An a wonaali, si wanaa jertinoowo
Pellet, Men nulirii ma goonga, ko a wewlinoowo e jertinoowo. Alaa e mofte, si wanaa jertinoowo feƴƴii e maɓɓe
Si ɓe fennii ma, hari adinooɓe ɓe ɓen fenniino (Nulaaɓe mun), fewndo ɓen Nulaaɓe maɓɓe addannoo ɓanngannduyeeji, e Ɗeri e Deftere ndayginoore
Refti nanngitir mi yedduɓe ɓen (halakuyee). Taskii no lepte An ɗen waɗtinirnoo
E a tinaali wonnde Alla jippinirii ndiyam ka kammu? Men fuɗiniri ɗam dimɗe seertuɗe noone. Hino ka pelle, ɗate daneeje e boɗeeje seertyuɗe noone, e pete ɓaleeje
Hino e yimɓe ɓen, e daabeeji ɗin, e neemoraaɗi ɗin, ɗi nooneeji mun kadi luutondiri. Anndu ko hulata Alla e jeyaaɓe Makko ɓen, ko annduɓe ɓen. Pellet, Alla ko Fooluɗo, Haforoowo
Ɓen janngooɓe Deftere Alla nden, ɓe ñiiɓi e julde, ɓe nafqii ko Men arsiki ɓe kon gunndoo e kene, hiɓe jortii njulaaku ngu sontataa
Fii no [Alla] hunnirana ɓe njoɓdiiji maɓɓe ɗin, O ɓeyda ɓe e ɓural Makko ngal. Kanko, ko O Haforoowo, Annditanoowo [on]
Kon ko Men wahayini e maaɗa e Deftere nden, ko ɗum woni goonga, gomɗinde e ɗen wonɗe yeeso mayre. Pellet, Alla ko Humpitiiɗo Rentuɗo jeyaaɓe Makko ɓen

Refti Men ronini Deftere nden, ɓen ɓe Men suɓii e jeyaaɓe Amen. Hino e maɓɓe tooñuɓe hoore-mun, hino e maɓɓe hakindinɗo, hino e maɓɓe foolondirooɓe e moƴƴereeji, duŋayee Alla; ko ɗum woni ɓural mawnungal ngal
Aljannaaji ñiiɓal, ɗi naatata e mun, hara hiɓe cuɗiree ton, jawe kaŋŋe e kaalise e lu’u-lu’u; comci maɓɓe ɗin ton, ko sooyi
Ɓe wi'a: "Yettoore woodanii Alla, On ittanɗo en suno. Pellet, Joomi men, ko Haforoowo, Warjotooɗo
On weernirɗo en ɓural Makko ngal, e galle ñiiɓal, tampere (woo) heɓataa en ton, wanaa ronkere heɓata en ton
Yedduɓe ɓen kan, ko Yiite Jahannama woodani ɓen; maayde ñaawetaake e maɓɓe, sakko ɓe maaya, ɓe hoynantaake kadi lepte magge ɗen. Ko wano nii Men yoɓitirta kala yedduɗo

Hara hiɓe ooloo nder ton [ɓe wi'a]: "Joomi amen, yaltin men; men golla moƴƴere, hara wonah ko men gollaynoo kon". [O jaaboo ɓe]: "E men wuurnaano on yeru ko waajitotooɗo waajitoranoo e mun? Jertinoowo kadi ari e mon? Awa meeɗee, sabu faabo alanaa tooñooɓe ɓen
Pellet, Alla ko Annduɗo wirniiɗi kammuuli ɗin e leydi ndin. Ko O Annduɗo ko suuɗii e ɓerɗe

Ko Kanko woni waɗuɗo on lontiiɓe ka leydi. Kala yedduɗo, ko e makko lorra geddi makko yantata. Yeddugol heeferɓe ɓen, ɓeydataa ɓe ka Joomi maɓɓe, si wanaa tikkere. Yeddugol ɓeydataa heeferɓe ɓen, si wanaa hayrere

Maaku: "E on yi'ii rendiiɗi mon rewoton gaanin Alla ɗin? Hollee lam ko ɗi tagi ka leydi. Kaa hiɗi mari geɓal e [tagugol] kammuuli ɗin? Kaa Men addan ɓe Deftere, nde ɓe woni e ɓanndannduyee mun? Si ko woni, tooñooɓe ɓen alaa e fodude yoga maɓɓe, si wanaa hodo
Pellet, ko Alla jogitii kammuuli ɗin e leydi ndin, fii wata ɗi dirtu. Hay si ɗi dirtayno, hay gooto jogitotaako ɗi e ɓaawo Makko. O laatike Muññiiɗo, Haforoowo

Ɓe woodndiri Alla, hattirde e goondooje maɓɓe, wonnde si jertinoowo arii e maɓɓe, pellet, ɓe wonay ɓurɓe feewude wootere e mofte ɗen. Nde jertinoowo non arunoo e maɓɓe, ɗum ɓeydaali ɓe, si wanaa woɗɗitagol

[Ɓe waɗiri ɗum] mawnintinaare ka keydi, e pewje ɓenɗe. Pewje bonɗe ɗen non huuɓitataa, si wanaa jom-mun'en. Hara hiɓe sabbitii, si wanaa sunna (Alla) on e adinooɓe ɓen? A heɓantaa sunna Alla on battiigu, a heɓantaa sunna Alla waylirɗum

E ɓee yiilaaki ka leydi, ɓe taskoo ko honno battane adinooɓe ɓen wonirnoo? Hari no ɓuri ɓe tiiɗude doole. Alla siforaali wonnde goɗɗum no ronkina Mo ka kammuuli maa ka leydi. Tawde pellet, ko O Annduɗo, Hattanɗo

Si tawno Alla nanngitirayno yimɓe ɓen ko ɓe faggitorii kon, O accataano ruugayngel e dow mayri. Ko woni tun, Himo nennitana ɓe haa e lajal anndaa ngal. Si lajal maɓɓe ngal hewtii, [O nanngay ɓe], tawde pellet, Alla ko Reenuɗo jeyaaɓe Makko ɓen
Yaa-Siin
Mi woondirii Al*ur'aana ñeñaande nden
Pellet, an (Nulaaɗo), ko a jeyaaɗo e Nulaaɓe ɓen
E dow laawol focciingol
Jippinannde On Fooluɗo, Hinnotoo
Fii yo a jertinir nde yimɓe, ɓe baabiraaɓe mun jertinanooka: ɓen ko welsindiiɓe
Gomɗii konngol [lepte] jojjii e ko ɓuri ɗuuɗude e maɓɓe; ɓen ɗon gomɗintaa
Menen Men waɗii ka daaɗe maɓɓe kolommbooje, ɗen ko yottiiɗe ka bokkuɗe; hara ko ɓe ŋalliniiɓe
Men waɗi yeeso maɓɓe heedo, ɓaawo maɓɓe kadi heedo, Men hippi ɓe (gite ɗen); waɗti ɓe yi'ataa [goonga]
Hino fota e maɓɓe, foti a jertini ɓe, maa a jertinaali ɓe; ɓe gomɗintaa
Anndu ko jertintaa (jaɓa), ko on jokkuɗo Jantoore (Alqur'aana) nden, o huli Jom-Yurmeende On ka wirnii. Wewlinir mo haforaneede e mbarjaari teddundi
Ko Menen woni wuurnitooɓe maayɓe ɓen, Men winnda ko ɓe ardini e batteeji maɓɓe. Kala huunde, Meɗen mofti nde e deftere ɓanngunde
Piyan-ɓe misal, fii yimɓe saare, tuma nde Nulaaɓe arunoo ɓe
Nde Men nulunoo e maɓɓe, [Nulaaɓe] ɗiɗo, ɓe fenni ɓen, Men sammbiniri ɓen, tataɓo, ɓe wi'i: "Menen, ko men Nulaaɓe e mo'on
[Yimɓe saare nden] wi'i: "On wonaali, si wanaa ko on ɓanndinke wano menen. Jom-hinaranke On jippinaali hay huunde, on wonaali, si wanaa ko on fenooɓe
[Nulaaɓe ɓen] wi'i: "Joomi amen no anndi pellet, ko men Nulaaɓe e mo'on
Fawaaki men non, si wanaa yottingol ɓanngina
[Yimɓe saare nden] wi'iti: "Men hiitori on kataa. Si tawii non on haɗitaaki, ma men fiɗu on, lepte muusuɗe kadi memira on immorde e amen
[Nulaaɓe ɓen kadi] wi'iti: "Kiite mon ɗin, hiɗon wonndi e mun. Ko si on waajaama (hiitinoɗon)? Tigi on, ko on yimɓe fantinooɓe
Gorko iwri ka ɓuri woɗɗude e saare nden, o ari himo yaccoo, o wi'i: "Ko onon yo yimɓe am, kori jokkee Nulaaɓe ɓen
jokkee ɓen ɓe lamndotaako on njoɓdi, ɓen ko fewnaaɓe
E ko haɗata lam rewugol On taguɗo Lam? Ko ka Makko woni ruttorde mon
E mi jogtoto reweteeɗi gaanin Makko? Si Jom-yurmeende On muuyanii lam lorra, tefoore majji duncantaali lam hay huunde, ɗi dɗandataa lam kadi
Haray min ontuma, mi wonii e majjere ɓanngunde
Min on, mi gomɗinii Joomi mon, nananee lam
wi'anaa: "Naatu Aljanna". O wi'i: "Haaniino yimɓe am ɓen annda
ko Joomi am haforani lam, O waɗi lam e teddinaaɓe ɓen
Men jippiniraano koneeli ka kammu, e yimɓe makko ɓen, ɓaawo maako. Men wonaanii jippinooɓe [ɗin koneeli]
(Halkeede maɓɓe) wonaali, si wanaa haacaango wooto, tawi ɓe laatii maayɓe-ɓutti
Ee hayreede jeyaaɓe [fenunooɓe]! Nulaaɗo araali e ɓɓe, si wanaa ɓe waɗtayno mo jalnori
E ɓee yi'aali ɗuuɗii e gire ɗe Men halki ado maɓɓe? Wonnde ɓen ruttitotaako e maɓɓe
Ɓe fow wonaali, si wanaa ko mooɓoyteeɓe ka Amen
Hino wonani ɓe maande: leydi yoorundi ndin, Men wuurniti ndi, Men yaltini gabbe e mayri, tawi ko e ɗen ɓe ñaamata
Men waɗi e mayri gese tamarooje e inabuuje, Men ɓulni e mayri ɓulli(ceewle)
fii no ɓe ñaamira dimɗe mun ɗen e kon ko ɓe golliri juuɗe maɓɓe ɗen. E ɓe yettataa (Alla)
Senaade woodanii taguɗo nooneeji ɗin On fow: gila e ko leydi ndin fuɗinta kon, haa e wonkiiji maɓɓe ɗin, e kon ko ɓe anndaa
Maande goo kadi wonanii ɓe: e jemma on, Meɗen sorta e makko ñalorma on, tawa ɓe wontii e niwre
E naange ngen, hinge doga haa e ñiiɓirde magge; ɗum ko eɓɓoore Fooluɗo, Annduɗo On
E lewru ndun, Men eɓɓani ndu jipporde, haa ndu waɗtinira wa baaŋal tamaro kiiɗngal
Wanaa naange ngen woni ko haanini hewtitagol lewru ndun, wanaa jemma on woni ko aditotoo ñalorma on; kala majji non, ko e laawol mun woni dogude
Maande goo wonanii ɓe, wonnde Men roondike geyngol maɓɓe ngol, ka laana hebbinaaka
Men tagani ɓe sugu makko, ko ɓe waɗɗoo
Si Meɗen yiɗuno, Men yoolayno ɓe; hara faabo alanaa ɓe, wanaa kadi ɓe daɗndeteeɓe
si wanaa yurmeende immornde e Amen, e dakmitagol haa e saanga
Si ɓe wi'anaama: "Rentee e kon ko woni yeeso mon e ɓaawo mon, belajo'o, on yurminte
Aaya woo e Aayeeje Joomi maɓɓe ɗen araali e maɓɓe, si wanaa ɓe ɗuurnooɗe
Si ɓe wi'anaama kadi: "Wintee(nafqe) e kon Alla arsiki on", yedduɓe ɓen wi'ana gomɗimɓe ɓen: "E men ñamminay on tawɗo si Alla muuyuno, O ñamminayno mo? On wonaali, si wanaa e nder majjere ɓanngunde
Hiɓe wi'a: "Ko honnde tuma woni ndee Fodoore, si on laatike goonguɓe
Ɓe habbaaki, si wanaa haacaango wooto, nanngayngo ɓe, hara hiɓe yeddondira
Ɓe waawoytaa wasiyagol ontuma, wanaa ɓe ruttoytooɓe e yimɓe maɓɓe ɓen
Wutte ka Alaandu, ɓe yaltira e genaale ɗen, ɓe heñora ka Joomi maɓɓe
hiɓe wi'a: "Ee bone amen! Ko hommbo immini men e genaale amen?" Ko ɗum woni ko Hinaranke On fodunoo; Nulaaɓe ɓen goonginii
(Ummital) ngal wonaano, si wanaa haacaango gooto, tawi ɓe fow ɓe addaama ka Amen
Hannde non, wonkii tooñirtaake hay huunde. On yoɓitirtaake, si wanaa kon ko gollaynoɗon
Yimɓe Aljanna ɓe hannde, pellet, hiɓe e nder soklio, hiɓe neeminoo
kamɓe e genndiraaɓe maɓɓe ɓen,e ley ɗowɗe, hiɓe soɓɓindii e hoore danɗe
Hino woodani ɓe ton, ɓiɗɓe leɗɗe, hino woodani kadi, kon ko ɓe noddata
Salaamun", konngol [kisiyee], immorde e Joomiraaɗo, Hinnotooɗo
Sertee non hande, onon ɓee bomɓe
Mi ahodaano e mon, onon ɓiɗɓe Aadama, wonnde wata on rewu seytaane? Tawde pellet, ko o gaño mon ɓannguɗo
[Mi yamiri on] kadi rewugol Lam. Ko ngol woni laawol focciingol ngol
Gomɗii o majjinii tagu ɗuuɗungu e mon. E on wonaano haqqilooɓe
Ko ngee woni Jahannama, nge wonanoɗon fodaneede ngen
Naatiree nge hannde, sabu kon ko yeddiraynoɗon
Hannde, Men notay e kunndule maɓɓe ɗen, juuɗe maɓɓe ɗen yewta Men, koyɗe maɓɓe ɗen kadi seeditoo e kon ko ɓe wonunoo e faggitagol
Si Men yiɗuno, Men mehayno gite maɓɓe ɗen, ɓe adondira e laawol ngol. Kono ko honno ɓe yiirata
Si Men yiɗuno kadi, Men montayno ɓe e nokku maɓɓe on; hara ɓe hattantaa feƴƴugol ɓe yiltotaako
Kala mo Men juutni nguurndam mun, Men yiltitay mo e tagu ngun. E ɓee haqqiltaa
Men anndinaali mo (kanko Muhammadu) gimɗi; ɗum haananaa mo. [Deftere] nden wonaali, si wanaa jantoore e janngeteende ɓanngunde
fii yo o jertin nde, on wonɗo wuurɗo (ɓernde), Konngol lepte ngol jojja e heeferɓe ɓen
E ɓe yi'aali, wonnde Men tagiranii ɓe neemoraaɗi, e ko juuɗe Amen golli, hara hiɓe jeyinooɗi
Men eltani ɓe ɗi: no e majji ɗi ɓe waɗɗotoo, no e majji ɗi ɓe ñaamata
hino woodani ɓe ton, nafooje e njaram. E ɓee kan yettataa (Mo)
Ɓe jogitorii gaanin Alla reweteeɗi, jortagol ɓe faabeedee
Ɗi hattanaa faabagol ɓe; ko ɓe konu tawneteengu e majji
Wata konngol maɓɓe sunine. Pellet, Meɗen anndi ko ɓe suuɗata e ko ɓe feññinta
E neɗɗanke on yi'aali, wonnde Men tagirii mo e toɓɓere maniiyu? Kono tawaa mo ko o wennjoowo ɓannguɗo
O fiyani Men misal, kono o yejjiti tageede makko; o wi'i: "Ko hommbo wuurnitata ƴi'e ɗen, si ɗe rappii
Maaku: "Ko wuurnitoowo ɗe, ko taguɗo ɗe On ka laawol aranol. Ko Kanko woni annduɗo fii kala tagu
On waɗanɗo on yiite, iwde e leɗɗe kecce, tawa ko e majje huɓɓirton nge
Kere taguɗo kammuuli ɗin e leydi ndin wonaali haɗtanɗo tagugol yeru maɓɓe? Ɗum ko pellet! Ko Kanko woni Ɗuuɗuɗo tageefo, Annduɗo
Anndon fiyaaku Makko On, si O faandanike huunde, ko O wi'anay nde tun: "Laato", nde laatoo
Senayee woodanii On Mo laamateeri kala huunde woni e juuɗe Mun! Ko ka Makko rutteteɗon
